name: You Me Virus
description:
You are Influenza and this season has not been good for you. The common cold is getting way higher ratings of infection on Instagerm. Wanting to show your superiority, you find a wealthy, eligible socialite to trick into falling in love with you and spreading your disease. But will you choose the party princ(ess) instead? Or maybe the white-hot workaholic politician? The choice is yours in You Me Virus!

-Backgrounds and title: Allison Traylor

-Characters: Peter Sheehan (perebite.itch.io)

-Story/Programming: Juliann Fields
